Activity: Check emails and project management system. Review all the work done this week.
Prepare a summary of the week's activities and findings. This should include a list of the tools evaluated, the integration plans developed, and the training materials created.
Present the summary of the week's activities to @lpro-1 and potentially other members of the development team. Get feedback and guidance on next steps.
Lunch break. Catch up on industry news and trends.

Based on the feedback received, prioritize the tasks for the next week. This could include continuing the integration of the chosen tool, evaluating additional tools, or focusing on specific areas such as build automation or asset management.
Clean up the workspace and organize all the documents and files related to the tool evaluation and integration process. Ensure that everything is properly labeled and stored in a central location.

Write a detailed summary of the week's accomplishments and challenges. Identify areas for improvement in the tool development process and make recommendations for future projects. Log off and prepare for the weekend.
